    • Method Detail

      • installServer

        static void installServer(java.lang.String modLoader,
                          java.lang.String modpackDir,
                          java.lang.String minecraftVersion,
                          java.lang.String modLoaderVersion,
                          java.lang.String javaPath)
        Installs the files for a Forge/Fabric server.
        Parameters:
        modLoader - String. The modloader for which to install the server.
        modpackDir - String. /server_pack The directory where the modloader server will be installed in.
        minecraftVersion - String. The Minecraft version for which to install the modloader and Minecraft server.
        modLoaderVersion - String. The modloader version for which to install the modloader and Minecraft server.
        javaPath - String. Path to Java installation needed to execute the Fabric and Forge installers.

      • zipBuilder

        static void zipBuilder(java.lang.String modpackDir,
                       java.lang.String modLoader,
                       java.lang.Boolean includeServerInstallation)
        Create a zip-archive of the serverpack, excluding Mojang's minecraft_server.jar. With help from https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1091788/how-to-create-a-zip-file-in-java
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. The directory where the zip-archive will be created and saved in.
        modLoader - String. Determines the name of Minecraft#s server jar which will be deleted from the zip-archive.
        includeServerInstallation - Boolean. Determines whether the Minecraft server jar needs to be deleted from the zip-archive.

      • deleteClientMods

        @Deprecated
static void deleteClientMods(java.lang.String modpackDir,
                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> clientMods)
        Deprecated. 
        Deletes client-side-only mods in server_pack, if specified.
        Parameters:
        modpackDir - String. /server_pack/mods The directory where the files will be deleted.
        clientMods - String List. Client mods to delete.
